item.title: Getting to Know Vault
item.description: #What is Vault? Vault is a secrets management tool from the excellent people at Hashicorp. A constantly evolving solution, based on academia, that always passes security audits with flying colors. It feels like using an encrypted Redis or Memcached. From the website - https://www.vaultproject.io/ > Vault secures, stores, and tightly controls access to tokens, passwords, certificates, API keys, and other secrets in modern computing. Vault handles leasing, key revocation, key rolling, and auditing.
